titles.title: You've Borne Me On Eagle's Wings

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To Thy throneroom I boldly enter
For grace to help in this time of need.
For this son I command You, Lord,
That you cause me to embrace the cross.
Chorus:
You've borne me on eagle's wings,
As a Father carried me;
Now I take hold by Thy grace,
O Lord, Thy power hid in the cross.
Now to Him Who is able to keep me,
Glory, and honor, and praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I place all of my hope in Thee
For that which my eyes do not yet see.
For this work You've begun in me,
Finish now as I embrace the cross.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Christ the Firstborn of many brethren
Who yet will follow after Thee,
Embraced the cross and was raised in power.
Father, cause me now to be a Son.
